translations: [医]畸形；畸形物（malformation 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: Some foetal malformations cannot be diagnosed until late in pregnancy.
sentences.translation: 有些胎儿的畸形部位得等到妊娠后期才能诊断出来。

sentences.sentence: Congenital heart disease - malformations of heart structure existing at birth.
sentences.translation: 先天性心脏病——出生时存在的心脏结构的畸形。

sentences.sentence: Malformations in secondary palate fusion will lead to cleft palate, a common human birth defect.
sentences.translation: 继发腭融合中的畸形将会导致一种常见的人类先天畸形——腭裂的发生。
